LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enable_TrueParentGenes: If enabled, it adjusts the gene set in children, they receive all the parents' genes, including archite genes if both parents have them. Affects pregnancy only.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enable_TrueXenotypes: If enabled, it adjusts the pawn's xenotype after gene implantation. The xenotype is assigned relative to the greatest match.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_CustomXenotypesImport_Desc: All custom xenotypes can be converted into standard xenotypes. Xenotypes converted in this way inherit: the name, genes and inheritance of the selected xenotype. Converted xenotypes are created when the game starts.
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_ButtonCustomXenotypesImport_Rese: All converted xenotypes will be deleted. Are you sure?
LanguageData.WVC_XaG_DialogCustomXenotypesImport_Succ: The xenotype has been converted and will be loaded the next time you start the game.
LanguageData.WVC_ToolTip_enable_CustomXenotypeImporte: If enabled, the necessary defs will be created for converted xenotypes when the game starts.
